channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Oracle Enterprise Command Center Framework
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Oracle Enterprise Command Center Framework

item.title: CVE-2024-21206|2024-10-15T19:52:40.270Z -- oracle%20corporation -- oracle%20enterprise%20command%20center%20framework
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Enterprise Command Center Framework product of Oracle E-Business Suite (component: Diagnostics). Supported versions that are affected are ECC:11-13. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Enterprise Command Center Framework. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Enterprise Command Center Framework accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
